This CUDPP distribution also includes the Mersenne twister code of Makoto Matsumoto, also licensed under BSD, as the file mt19937ar.c, and a modified version of FindGLEW.cmake from nvidia-texture-tools, licensed under the MIT license.

CUDPP also calls functions in the Thrust template library, which is included with CUDA 4.0 and licensed under the Apache 2.0 open source license.
